executable.title: FiberBundleLabelSelect
executable.description: Fiber bundle label select allows a user to select tracts passing or not passing through a single or multiple labels. The label is defined as a labelmap and has to be provided by the user. One approach to generate the labeled volume is by means of the Editor module.
executable.contributor: Demian Wassermann, Fan Zhang, Lauren O'Donnell

integer-vector.name: PassLabel
integer-vector.label: Labels to include
integer-vector.description: Comma separated list of label values that defines pass region.

string-enumeration.name: PassOperation
string-enumeration.label: Combine include labels
string-enumeration.description: And or Or logical operation used to combine include labels

integer-vector.name: NotPassLabel
integer-vector.label: Labels to exclude
integer-vector.description: Comma separated list of label values that defines no pass region.

string-enumeration.name: NoPassOperation
string-enumeration.label: Combine exclude labels
string-enumeration.description: And or Or logical operation used to combine exclude labels
